knimeNode.name: SDFWebViewer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to view SDF molecules in web browser

fullDescription.intro:
Node to view SDF molecules in web browser
KNIME Node which on open it's view starts a web service and opens a web browser with a url to that webservice.
* Each node has own html page * Webservice should
* Each instance of view should have own webservice on own port * host static html page and js/css etc. * REST interface to fill page with items from the node's input via node's model. * Websocket for signalling to web browser when
* view closed * input changed * hilite events
* have a swagger document (nice to have)
fullDescription.option: Column with SDF molecules in port 0.
